channel.title: EXP Help
channel.description:
Hi, I need some help with my server.
Its a 317, Dodian Base but I want to stop the xp rate it gives now. I KNOW HOW TO AND I DID. But my problem is I need to find out how to make it so - (Oh btw I need this for the npc 1 ((which is a man)))
So when the npc (man) dies by the player attacking it
give 25 xp sendMessage you have gained 25 xp.
Can anyone help with that?
